mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PUSER ( P_ID, P_PASSWD, P_NAME, P_PHONE, P_EMAIL, SKILL ) VALUES( #{p_id}, #{p_passwd}, #{p_name}, #{p_phone}, #{p_email}, #{skill} )

INSERT INTO CUSER ( C_ID, C_PASSWD, C_NAME, C_PHONE, C_COMPANY, C_BCODE, C_EMAIL )
VALUES( #{c_id}, #{c_passwd}, #{c_name}, #{c_phone}, #{c_company}, #{c_bcode}, #{c_email} )
mapper.select: SELECT P_ID, P_PASSWD, P_NAME, P_PHONE, P_EMAIL, SKILL FROM PUSER WHERE P_ID=#{p_id}
SELECT P_ID, P_PASSWD FROM PUSER WHERE P_ID=#{arg0, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P_PASSWD=#{arg1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT C_ID, C_PASSWD FROM CUSER WHERE C_ID=#{arg0, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C_PASSWD=#{arg1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT C_ID, C_PASSWD, C_NAME, C_PHONE, C_COMPANY, C_BCODE, C_EMAIL FROM CUSER WHERE C_ID = #{ c_id }
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSER SET C_PASSWD = #{ c_passwd }, C_NAME = #{ c_name }, C_PHONE = #{ c_phone }, C_COMPANY = #{ c_company }, C_BCODE = #{ c_bcode }, C_EMAIL = #{ c_email } WHERE C_ID = #{ c_id }
